bind

public void bind()
Method that does the bind. It will look in the form and associate fields, actions and dataproviders with components in the UI. This method should be the last one used by a binder.

registerWidgetBinder

public WidgetBinder registerWidgetBinder(String name,
                                         WidgetBinder binder)
Associates the specified widget binder with the field with the specified name. Use this to register a custom widget binder to a specified field.

Parameters:
name - the name with which the specified widget binder is to be associated.
binder - the widget binder to be associated with the specified name.
Returns:
previous widget associated with specified name, or null if none.

invokeFormAction

public void invokeFormAction(ActionMetadata actionMetadata)
Invokes the specified action defined by actionMetadata. All exceptions are handled by the method itself

Parameters:
actionMetadata - the ActionMetadata that represents an action

updateFormSelection

public void updateFormSelection(DataProviderMetadata dataProviderMetadata,
                                int[] indexes)
Updates the form selection of the DataProvider defined by dataProviderMetadata. All exceptions are handled by the method itself

Parameters:
dataProviderMetadata - the DataProviderMetadata that represents a DataProvider
indexes - the indexes used to update form selection

populateForm

public void populateForm(FieldMetadata fieldMetadata,
                         Object value)
Updates the form field defined by fieldMetadata. All exceptions are handled by the method itself

Parameters:
fieldMetadata - the FieldMetadata that represents a form field
value - the value to be set

getIndexesFromUI

public int[] getIndexesFromUI(int[] selected,
                              boolean isBlank)
Converts the UI selected indexes to be used in the form. If the widget uses a blank label, 1 is subtracted from all indexes. If any index is less than zero, the index is removed.

Parameters:
selected - the selected indexes
isBlank - true if the widget uses a blank label
Returns:
the converted indexes to be used in the form

getIndexesFromController

public int[] getIndexesFromController(int[] selected,
                                      boolean isBlank)
Converts the form selected indexes to be used in UI. If the widget uses a blank label, 1 is added to all indexes. If any index is less than zero, -1 is assigned to it.

Parameters:
selected - the selected indexes
isBlank - true if the widget uses a blank label
Returns:
the converted indexes to be used in the UI
